actions.Shocking Grasp (Cantrip): Melee Spell Attack: +8+1d6 + 5 to hit (with advantage if the target is wearing armor made of metal), reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (3d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.
actions.Spellcasting: The sage casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (save DC 14+1d6 + 11, +6+1d6 + 3 to hit with spell attacks):
actions.Fireball (3rd-Level Spell; 3/Day): The sage creates a fiery explosion centered on a point it can see within 150 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 14+1d6 + 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire spreads around corners and ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.
